Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,6 +1,21 @@
 def run(L):
     return L.lower(),L.upper()
+print('Bai 7.4:')
 L=input()
 h,H=run(L)
 print(h)
\ No newline at end of file
-print(H)
+print(H)
+def dem(L):
+    so=0
+    chu=0
+    for i in L:
+        if i.isnumeric():
+            so+=1
+        elif i.isalpha():
+            chu+=1
+    return so,chu
+print('Bai 7.5:')
+so,chu=dem(input())
+print('Chu cai:',chu)
+print('Chu so:',so)
+
